text: I think Obama gave a great speech on
Race I could definitely relate to it
because you
know coming from Haiti you know you have
like what's still called the upper class
and then what's considered the lower
class you know what I'm saying and um
and sometimes you know because someone
from the upper class makes it the lower
class want to hate and you say where the
hell is this hate coming from like why
do they feel a certain way well they
feel that way because there's nothing

but they take it back two generations or
three generations before and that hate
is coming from the fact of they're
saying well our super super ancestors
were slaves you know and you know we
basically feel like we're in a same

understand
and similar to Obama I mean what I feel
is
that you know there's Moses right and
